text.autoconfig.idontcare.title: IDontCare
text.autoconfig.idontcare.option.display: When enabled, the background of incompatible resourcepacks will be red.
When enabled, incompatible resourcepacks change their name to 'Incompatible' while hovered.
When enabled, incompatible resourcepacks change their description to '(Made for an older/newer version of Minecraft)' while hovered.
text.autoconfig.idontcare.option.incompa: When enabled, incompatible resourcepacks will display a confirmation screen.
